meanings.sent1: The ceremony was vowless, with no promises made.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a vowless relationship, free from commitments.
meanings.sent3: The vowless wedding had everyone surprised but happy.
meanings.sent4: Their vowless bond was stronger than any written promise.
meanings.sent5: The vowless agreement allowed for more flexibility and understanding.

meanings.sent1: The vowless couple decided to keep their relationship simple.
meanings.sent2: Their marriage was vowless, but their love was strong.
meanings.sent3: The vowless ceremony was quick and to the point.
meanings.sent4: Their vowless commitment was based on trust and respect.
meanings.sent5: The vowless union symbolized their deep connection beyond words.
